effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) removes major status effects from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) removes major status effects from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

short_effect.sword_shield: Cures the entire party of major status effects after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Cures the entire party of major status effects after inflicting damage.

short_effect.legends_arceus: Cures the entire party of major status effects after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.
